name: America's Army
description:
America's Army is an action-shooter game developed by U.S. Army. It was originally released in 2002. U.S. Army published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, America's Army has a score of 82. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
America's Army is available on PC.
Doyle W. Donehoo scored the game.
